ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | atcvr1.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |

| 3 |  | atcvr1.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_hlomcmcv | |- ( K e. HL -> ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. CvLat ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_cvlatcvr2 | |- ( ( ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. CvLat ) /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> ( P =/= Q <-> P C ( Q .\/ P ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> ( P =/= Q <-> P C ( Q .\/ P ) ) ) |
